alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Laurens; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, Wilkinson, southeastern Twiggs and Bleckley Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near McIntyre to near Jeffersonville to Magnolia, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, McIntyre, Toomsboro, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Coley Station, Mobley Crossing, Nicklesville, Baileys Park, Magnolia, Royal, District Path, Paulk, Goldsboro, Chappells Mill, Cary and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
